name: Lego Dimensions: Midway Arcade Level Pack
summary: Your favorite retro Midway Arcade characters have escaped from their games, and Gamer Kid needs your help to put them back where they belong! Build Gamer Kid, attach him to his Lego Toy Tag and place him on the Lego Toy Pad to see him come to life in the game. Activate his Stealth, Laser, Speed, Invulnerability and Super Strength abilities to solve puzzles and overpower enemies. When he needs a power-up, add the rebuildable 3-in-1 G-6155 Spy Hunter car or Arcade Machine into the game!
